items.desc: CSGO, short for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, is a highly popular first-person shooter (FPS) video game developed by Valve Corporation. It is the fourth installment in the Counter-Strike series and has gained a massive following since its release in 2012.

In CSGO, players are divided into two teams: terrorists and counter-terrorists. The game features various game modes, but the most prominent and widely played mode is the classic competitive mode. In this mode, the terrorists' objective is to plant and detonate a bomb at designated sites, while the counter-terrorists aim to prevent the bomb from being planted or defuse it if it is.

CSGO offers other game modes such as casual matches, deathmatch, and custom community servers. The game also has a strong esports presence, with professional tournaments and leagues attracting millions of viewers and featuring top teams from around the world. CSGO has a dedicated community that continually creates custom maps, skins, and modifications, adding to the game's longevity and variety. Valve regularly updates the game with balance changes, new maps, and gameplay enhancements to keep the experience fresh for players.
